item.title: South Korean Financial Regulatory Authority Introduces Virtual Asset Loan Service Guidelines, Prohibits Over-Leveraging
item.description: On September 5th, according to the report of Newsprime, South Korea's financial regulatory authorities have introduced the first virtual asset loan service guide. Due to the intensified exchange competition resulting in increased investor risks, the regulators have completely prohibited leverage and cash loans. They have established individual limits and fee caps and prevented similar short-selling behaviors. On the 5th, the Financial Services Commission of South Korea announced that it will implement a self-regulatory "Virtual Asset Loan Service Guide" developed by the Financial Supervisory Service and DAXA. The new guide focuses on three core aspects: service scope restriction, user protection, and market stability. The guide clearly prohibits over-leveraging and Korean won cash loans. It requires exchanges to use their own assets to provide services and prohibits third-party trusteeship or indirect lending models.Regarding the enhancement of user protection measures, first-time us

item.title: Two Whale Addresses Accumulate 22,753 MKR via FalconX
item.description: On September 5th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, two whale addresses accumulated 22,753 MKR through FalconX.Among them, wallet 0xb2c7 received 14,000 MKR from FalconX 6 hours ago, with a value of USD 24.25 million.Wallet 0xc230 has received 8,753 MKR (USD 15.37 million) from FalconX over the past 2 months.

item.title: Fenghuang Finance: In the future, there are also plans to include BTC, SOL, and other assets in the company's strategic reserves
item.description: September 5th - Sequoia Capital China has amassed 10,000 ETH in the open market. Sequoia Capital China declared that the acquired ETH will be categorized as investment assets within the financial statements. In the forthcoming period, the company intends to continuously augment its allocation to digital assets. Apart from Ethereum, it also has the plan to explore diversifying its strategic reserve assets to encompass mainstream digital assets like BTC and SOL. (Caixin)

item.title: Listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, Ying Universe Invests HK$300 Million to Subscribe for Shares of Quantum Wealth, Aiming to Promote Web 3 Ecosystem Development
item.description: On September 5th, as per an official announcement, the Hong Kong-listed company Meitu Universe has allocated 300 million Hong Kong dollars to subscribe for discounted shares of Nation Digital Group in order to boost the development of the Web 3 ecosystem. The two parties have reached a subscription agreement, with Nation Digital Group conditionally agreeing to issue a total of approximately 169 million subscription shares to the company at a subscription price of HKD 1.78 per share. Once the transaction is finalized, the two parties will collaborate to promote the digital economic development policies of the Hong Kong government and make strategic investments in the fintech field.

item.title: Bybit TradFi Officially Goes Live with FUTU and DFDV
item.description: September 5th. Bybit made an announcement that FUTU and DFDV Stock CFDs have become available on Bybit TradFi. Futu Holdings Limited (Stock Code: FUTU); DeFi Development Corp. (Stock Code: DFDV). Users are able to trade CFD contracts of the aforementioned two stocks via the Bybit TradFi platform, being able to enjoy 24/7 trading, flexible leverage, and deep liquidity support. This has further enhanced Bybit's standing in the traditional financial asset space and offers global users more diversified investment choices.

item.title: LookOnChain: OKX now supports Google Pay
item.description: On September 5th, according to official channels, Google Pay has officially been launched on the OKX App. Android users in the EU and the US are able to utilize this payment method to achieve instant deposits and purchases, with operations that are convenient and secure. As a payment method trusted by users, the integration of Google Pay makes the transaction process more reassuring. In the context of rapidly changing market conditions, users can use Google Pay to quickly implement their investment strategies.In response to this, OKX CEO Star stated that the integration of Google Pay will bring users a "simple, secure, and seamless trading experience."

item.title: Anchorage Digital-associated address deposits 5 million ENA to Binance, worth $3.37 million
item.description: On September 5th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), it was monitored that an address affiliated with Anchorage Digital deposited 5 million ENA into Binance within the past 17 hours, with a total value of $3.37 million. Currently, the address still holds 13.31 million ENA, approximately $8.71 million.Before this, Anchorage partnered with Ethena to introduce the stablecoin USDtb to the US market, making it a stablecoin compliant with the "GENIUS Act."

item.title: Due to the "Nasdaq Enhances Cryptocurrency Investment Scrutiny" news, US DAT companies saw a general decline in their stock prices.
item.description: On September 5th, based on market information, the stock prices of DAT companies in the US generally fell due to the news of "Nasdaq Strengthening Cryptocurrency Investment Review." Specifically:The WLFI Treasury company ALT5 Sigma (ALTS) plummeted by 13.81%;The Ethereum Treasury company Bitmine (BMNR) dropped by 5.95%;SharpLink Gaming (SBET) decreased by 8.26%;The over-the-counter trading company Galaxy Digital (GLXY) declined by 6.07%.Yesterday's news indicated that Nasdaq is enhancing its review of the cryptocurrency investment behavior of its listed companies.

item.title: Tether Backs Digital Asset Infrastructure Company Pointsville in Series A Funding and Plans Loyalty Program Collaboration
item.description: On September 5th, as per PRNewswire, the digital asset infrastructure firm Pointsville announced the completion of its Series A financing. This was led by Valor Capital Group and involved participation from Tether, Superscrypt backed by Temasek, SNZ, Credit Saison, K2 Integrity, Citrino, and Dynamo, among others. The specific amount of the funding has not been made public at present. The new funds are earmarked for the company's asset digitization and RWA transformation.It is reported that Tether will cooperate with Pointsville to provide the necessary support for integrating real-world assets and loyalty programs into the digital economy.

item.title: Strike Founder: Bitcoin is Disrupting the Currency Market, Ethereum is at Best a Tech Startup
item.description: On September 5th, the founder of Strike, Jack Mallers, responded to Joseph Lubin, the co-founder of Ethereum, who previously stated that Ethereum would surpass Bitcoin. He said, "I think this view is ridiculous. Bitcoin is disrupting the currency market, and that is Bitcoin's goal. It is a $500 trillion question of value. Ethereum is a technology. At best, it is also an emerging tech company. The two cannot be compared."
